# Use the Zuora application for updating subscription trigger dates

This task topic explains how to update subscription trigger dates in the Zuora Billing UI and Orders UI.

In the Zuora Billing UI, ensure that the Allow update Subscription trigger dates? setting is set to Yes in the Billing Settings > Default Subscription and Order Settings.

In the Zuora Billing UI and the Orders UI, you can directly update the trigger dates for a subscription.

1.  Go to the subscription details page of the target subscription for which you are to update the subscription trigger dates.
2.  In the subscription details page, click the set activation dates button. ![setActivationDates](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/93cfb98f-fe0d-4eb4-b359-63a9c1385fd5?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ktN6zJ2Dy9xZatpjG4AlNlsxIYEw6GsaFTSi-QRnKHA) The set activation dates window will display.
3.  In the set activation dates window, you can either directly enter a date in the date field or click a calendar icon to select a specific date as the corresponding trigger date: the Contract Effective, Service Activation, or Customer Acceptance date. ![SetActivationDatesDetails](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/5767a04c-84e8-45d3-a1b6-2fe714dc1c75?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..RCWyUXokPXmYYidng0M_uKxJEDSmQ3LTF2VymASHqBE)
4.  Click save.
